msbt.message: Heya, !<10_4 /> So how's it feel bein' the talk of the island right now, ?
Heya, !<10_4 /> So how's it feel bein' the talk of the island right now, ?
Word is you've been tryin' to get K.K. to stop by this place on his latest concert tour, .
Dunno if you knew this, but I'm a great big K.K. fan myselfIf you actually manage to get K.K. to do a show here on our island, I'll be one happy !

From this moment on, I'm gonna do everythin' I can to help you spiff up this place and get K.K. to notice us!Start makin' room in advance, 'cause I'm gonna start givin' you whatever I think might help get that done!
To show I mean business, take this!
Your idea is to boost this place so it'll get noticed by K.K., right?I wonder if somethin' like my here might help.
Heya, ! How's your island-boostin' scheme to convince K.K. to come here goin'?

Know you got your hands full tryin' to buff this place up enough that K.K. will consider stoppin' here But I wantcha to know that if I see anythin' I think might help you in that effort, I still plan on sharin' it.
Got a little somethin' here for you.
Got somethin' else here for you.
So I know you're tryin' to make this place shine as a K.K. tour stopThought somethin' like might help you.

I had a brainstorm and dug out my old That there's a color you don't see on this island much, so it'll jump right out at folks who come here visitin'.Word might get back to K.K. about how open-minded and cool we are here, maybe inspire him to drop by
That there's a DIY recipe to make .An island all decked out with stuff handcrafted by its biggest booster is just bound to impress ol' K.K.!
